servinfo.title: Driver Air Bag (Inflator) Module Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Driver Air Bag (Inflator) Module Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: Never disassemble air bag (inflator) module or measure its resistance. Otherwise, personal injury may result.

attention2.ptxt: If air bag (inflator) module was dropped from a height of 90 cm (3 ft) or more, it should be replaced.

servinfo.ptxt: Check air bag (inflator) module visually and if any of the following is found, replace it with a new one.

item.ptxt: Inflator case (2) being damaged or having been exposed to strong impact (dropped)
Bend or deformity of air bag (inflator) module bracket.
